hero.subtitle: Our AI analyzes your skills, identifies gaps, benchmarks your salary, and builds a step-by-step plan to get you where you want to be. What used to cost $500/hour with a career coach, done in 90 seconds.
hero.trust: Trusted by professionals transitioning into AI, cloud, and modern tech roles

features.title: Six powerful lenses on your career
features.subtitle: Each analysis gives you a complete picture ‚Äî not generic advice, but personalized insights based on YOUR experience, YOUR target role, and YOUR market.

cards.title: CV Deep Analysis
cards.description: Our AI reads your entire CV and extracts every skill, certification, project, and implicit competency ‚Äî even the ones you forgot to mention.

cards.title: Skill Gap Analysis
cards.description: See exactly what stands between you and your target role. Each gap is color-coded by severity with a concrete plan and timeline to close it.
cards.highlight: Prioritized by impact on your job search

cards.title: Salary Intelligence
cards.description: Know your worth. Get location-aware salary ranges for both your current and target roles, plus negotiation scripts tailored to your experience level.

cards.title: Role Recommendations
cards.description: Discover 3 roles where your skills create the most value ‚Äî complete with fit scores, salary ranges, target companies, and time-to-ready estimates.
cards.highlight: Roles you might not have considered

cards.title: Personalized Action Plan
cards.description: Not vague advice ‚Äî specific actions with deadlines. 30-day quick wins to build momentum, 90-day skill sprints, and a 12-month career trajectory.
cards.highlight: Every action has a resource and time estimate

cards.title: AI Career Coach
cards.description: Ask follow-up questions, get interview prep, request LinkedIn message templates, or dive deeper into any part of your analysis. Your AI coach knows your full profile.

howItWorks.title: From CV to career clarity in 3 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: No account required. No credit card. Upload your CV, answer a few questions, and let AI do the heavy lifting.

steps.title: Upload Your CV
steps.description: Drag and drop your PDF resume. Our AI reads every detail ‚Äî job titles, technologies, certifications, project descriptions, and even infers skills you didn't explicitly list.
steps.detail: Supports PDFs up to 5MB. Your data is processed securely and never stored.

steps.title: Tell Us Where You're Headed
steps.description: What role are you targeting? Where do you want to work? What's your salary goal? A quick 2-minute questionnaire gives our AI the context it needs.
steps.detail: Optionally paste a specific job posting for a targeted match analysis.

steps.title: Get Your Career Roadmap
steps.description: In about 90 seconds, receive a comprehensive analysis: fit score, strengths that make you stand out, gaps to close, salary benchmarks, and a step-by-step plan.
steps.detail: Download as PDF, chat with your AI coach, or match against specific job postings.

howItWorks.timeEstimate: Total time: about 3 minutes from upload to full career roadmap

linkedin.title: LinkedIn Plan
linkedin.subtitle: Personalized optimization strategy for your LinkedIn profile
linkedin.headline: Headline Suggestions
linkedin.headlineAdvice: Your headline appears in search results, comments, and connection requests. Front-load keywords that recruiters search for. Max 220 characters.
linkedin.aboutAdvice: First 3 lines show without clicking "see more" ‚Äî make them count. Write in first person, be specific, end with a call to action.
linkedin.featuredAdvice: Pin 3-6 visual items that prove your headline claims. Use custom thumbnails for maximum impact.
linkedin.skillsNote: Don't remove skills entirely ‚Äî move them down. LinkedIn allows 50 skills, use all of them.
linkedin.contentAdvice: Posting consistently is the #1 accelerator for career transitions on LinkedIn. You don't need to go viral ‚Äî just be visible to the right 500 people.
linkedin.contentFrequency: Recommended: 1-3 posts per week. Best times: Tue-Thu, 8-10 AM in your target market's timezone.
linkedin.connectionsAdvice: Connect with people in your target domain. Personalize every request (3-4 sentences max). Comment on 5-10 posts daily ‚Äî this is more effective than posting.

motivation.fitScore: This score reflects where you stand today ‚Äî not where you can be. Every gap you close pushes this number higher.
motivation.strengths: These are your superpowers. The skills and experiences that make you stand out from other candidates. Lead with these in interviews.
motivation.gaps: Gaps aren't weaknesses ‚Äî they're your growth roadmap. Every successful career transition involves closing a few of these. You've got this.
motivation.actionPlan: Here's your step-by-step playbook. Start with the 30-day wins to build momentum, then tackle the bigger moves. Small consistent actions compound into career transformation.
motivation.roles: These roles match your unique combination of skills and experience. Some might surprise you ‚Äî that's often where the best opportunities hide.
motivation.salary: Knowledge is negotiating power. Understanding your market value helps you make confident decisions about your next move.
motivation.jobMatch: Here's how your profile stacks up against this specific opportunity. Use the suggestions below to tailor your application.
motivation.linkedin: Your LinkedIn profile is often the first impression. These optimizations can significantly increase your visibility to recruiters.
